name: Steamer Cuban Mojo Rotisserie Chicken
description: Cook a Rotisserie-Style chicken, in 20 min, using our innovative Round Steamer! No need to heat up the kitchen during hot summer months. The Cuban inspired marinade brings bright citrus flavours and garlicky goodness to the tender and juicy chicken.
preparation: Place chicken in Round Steamer, breast-side down. Shake on half the marinade mix and rub over meat. Turn chicken over, breast-side up, and rub remaining marinade mix all over to evenly coat.
Cover; microwave on high for 20 min.
To test for doneness, insert an instant read thermometer into thickest part of the meat (all the way to the middle, not touching any bone). It should register at 180° F.
tips: For crispier skin in the microwave, remove the lid during the last 5 min of cooking.
Instead of the microwave, roast chicken in pre-heated oven at 400° F for 65–70 min.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup steamed veggies and 1 cup rice or 1 whole-grain roll.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!
